titles.title: Free Press Act of 2019
To require the President, or a designee of the President, to provide frequent press briefings covering the official business of the President to the White House press corps.
Free Press Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Free Press Act of 2019
This bill requires the President or his designee, at least twice a week, to brief members of the press assigned to report on the White House on the official business of the President.
Each briefing shall be video recorded and transmitted to the public.
